mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_roles ( name, description, create_time, update_time, dtflag, url, priority, initPwd ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{description}, #{createdatetime}, #{updatedatetime}, #{dtflag}, #{url}, #{priority}, #{initPwd} )
mapper.select: SELECT u.* FROM `sys_users` u INNER JOIN `sys_use_role` r ON u.`id`=r.`user_id` WHERE u.`dtflag`=0 AND r.`role_id`=#{id}
SELECT role.* FROM `sys_roles` role INNER JOIN `sys_use_role` sur ON role.`id`=sur.`role_id` WHERE sur.`user_id`=#{id}
SELECT `id`, `name`, `update_time`, `create_time`, `description`, `dtflag`, `url`, `priority`, `initPwd` from sys_roles role where id=#{id}
